channel.title: 4 QUESTIONS plz
channel.description:
Okay I got a few questions for u guys.
1. how do i make anti-pots work? 2. how do i make npc drops work? 3. how do i make it so if you click on a dummy it heals your prayers? 4. how do I make it so if sum1 is in battle they cannot log out?
thats it!
